description:
Do you want to find out the current position of a family member's plane? No problem, with the Flight Tracker App you can quickly and easily track flights from now on. The flight tracking is done in real time.
Top Features:
✔️ Smooth design
✔️ Easy menu
✔️ All relevant flight information (type of the plane, flight level, speed, departure time and the time of arrival of the respective air route)
✔️ Current position & Total Airway
✔️ Worldwide Flight Schedules / Timetables
✔️ Flight Board
✔️ All arrival and departure information
✔️ Worldwide Airport Map
✔️ Flight Time Calculator
✔️ Airport Wifi-Map
✔️ & much more
Do you want to check, which planes are currently flying above your house or identify the point of departure, type of aircraft and airline at the same time? Do you want to just find out where family members, friends or business partners are, because you are tired of worrying? No problem - you have these bits of information at hand thanks to Easy Flight Tracker!
✔️ Download Easy Flight Tracker for free

title: Easy Flight Tracker ✔️ Free Flight Radar
